measures.specification: Check that the value of ${context.fieldsActedUpon} is not empty and that data prerequisites for determining validity are met ${context.fieldsConsulted}.
Check that dwc:eventDate matches an ISO date that contains a time
For values of dwc:eventDate specified as a date range, calculate the duration in seconds.

validations.criterion: The value for eventDate must be consistent with atomic parts
validations.specification: Check that the value for dwc:eventDate is consistent with the values for atomic parts.

validations.criterion: The value for eventDate must be consistent with verbatimEventDate
validations.specification: Check that the value of dwc:verbatimEventDate parses to the same value as dwc:eventDate.

validations.criterion: The time specified as part of eventDate must be consistent with eventTime
validations.specification: Check that the time extracted from dwc:eventDate matches the value for dwc:eventTime

validations.criterion: dwc:eventDate specifies a date to a day or less.
validations.specification: Check that the value for dwc:eventDate specifies a duration of one day or less.

validations.criterion: dwc:eventDate specifies a date range of between a day and a month.
validations.specification: Check that the value for dwc:eventDate specifies a duration of 31 days or less

validations.criterion: dwc:eventDate specifies a date range of between a month and a year.
validations.specification: Check that the value for dwc:eventDate specifies a duration of one year or less

validations.criterion: dwc:eventDate specifies a date range of between a year and a decade.
validations.specification: Check that the value for dwc:eventDate specifies a duration of 10 years or less

improvements.enhancement: Recommendation to fill in dwc:eventDate based on values from atomic fields
